metadata.title: CVE-2020-11880 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in KDE KMail before 19.12.3. By using theproprietary (non-RFC6068) "mailto?attach=..." parameter, a website (orother source of mailto links) can make KMail attach local files to acomposed email message without showing a warning to the user, asdemonstrated by an attach=.bash_history value.

criterions.comment: kmail package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
